meanings.definition: A representation of two bones crossed, often used as a symbol of danger or death.
meanings.sent1: The pirate flag displayed menacing crossbones.
meanings.sent2: The skull and crossbones warned of danger ahead.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decoration featured spooky crossbones.
meanings.sent4: The crossbones on the flag were a chilling reminder of mortality.
meanings.sent5: The crossbones symbolized the end of the journey.
